title: Face Wash - Neem Tulsi
description: The natural base maintains balance of the skin. Its regular use gives spotless skin with glowing complexion.
advantages: (-) The natural base maintains oil balance of the skin
(-) Regular use gives spotless and glowing complexion
(-) This special face wash enriched with disinfectants and purifiers
(-) Neem and Tulsi cleans the acne prone oily skin thoroughly without any irritation
how-to-use: Wash your face with plain water.
Apply Face wash and gently rub with fingers.
Wash the face thoroughly with plain water.
